mapper.select:
SELECT
operation_info.opernum, COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM
operation_info left join rsvt on operation_info.rsvt = rsvt.rsvt
WHERE
operation_info.opernum IN (SELECT
operation_info.opernum
FROM
operation_info
WHERE
(operation_info.operday BETWEEN #{stday} AND #{endday})
AND
operation_info.opercar = #{opercar}
GROUP BY operation_info.opernum)
AND
operation_info.opercar = #{opercar}
GROUP BY operation_info.opernum
ORDER BY rsvt.stday, operation_info.opernum, operation_info.operday, rsvt.stt;

SELECT rsvt.rsvtseq, rsvt.desty, rsvt.stday, rsvt.endday, operation_info.operseq, operation_info.opernum, operation_info.rsvt, operation_info.operday, operation_info.operno, rsvt.numm, operation_info.atlm, operation_info.opertype, operation_info.operid, operation_info.opercar, IFNULL((SELECT vehicleinfo.vehicle FROM vehicleinfo WHERE vehicleinfo.carnumber = operation_info.opercar), operation_info.opercar) AS vehicle, (SELECT customer.ctmname FROM customer WHERE customer.ctmno = rsvt.ctmno) AS ctmname, operation_info.operconfirm, operation_info.opertrash
FROM
operation_info left join rsvt on operation_info.rsvt = rsvt.rsvt
WHERE
(operation_info.operday BETWEEN #{stday} AND #{endday})
AND
operation_info.opercar = #{opercar}
AND
operation_info.dayst = 1
ORDER BY rsvt.stday, operation_info.opernum, operation_info.operday, rsvt.stt;

SELECT
operation_reg.*
FROM
operation_reg
WHERE
operation_reg.regopercar = #{regopercar}
AND
operation_reg.regoperday BETWEEN #{regstartd} AND #{regendd}
GROUP BY operation_reg.conum, operation_reg.codenum
ORDER BY operation_reg.operregseq, operation_reg.regoperday

SELECT
operation_reg.*, regular.*, regulardetail.*,
IFNULL((SELECT vehicleinfo.vehicle FROM vehicleinfo WHERE vehicleinfo.carnumber = operation_reg.regopercar), operation_reg.regopercar) AS idvehicle,
IFNULL((SELECT vehicleinfo.id FROM vehicleinfo WHERE vehicleinfo.carnumber = operation_reg.regopercar), operation_reg.regopercar) AS idid,
IFNULL((SELECT employeeinfo.name FROM employeeinfo WHERE employeeinfo.id = operation_reg.regoperid), operation_reg.regoperid) AS idname
FROM
operation_reg
LEFT JOIN
regular
ON
operation_reg.conum = regular.conum
LEFT JOIN
regulardetail
ON
operation_reg.codenum = regulardetail.codenum
WHERE
operation_reg.regopercar = #{regopercar}
AND
operation_reg.regoperday BETWEEN #{regstartd} AND #{regendd}
ORDER BY operation_reg.regoperday, regulardetail.rdnum, operation_reg.operregseq

SELECT
operation_reg.*, regular.*, regulardetail.*,
IFNULL((SELECT vehicleinfo.vehicle FROM vehicleinfo WHERE vehicleinfo.carnumber = operation_reg.regopercar), operation_reg.regopercar) AS idvehicle,
IFNULL((SELECT vehicleinfo.id FROM vehicleinfo WHERE vehicleinfo.carnumber = operation_reg.regopercar), operation_reg.regopercar) AS idid,
IFNULL((SELECT employeeinfo.name FROM employeeinfo WHERE employeeinfo.id = operation_reg.regoperid), operation_reg.regoperid) AS idname,
IFNULL((SELECT regularcourse.rcsepa FROM regularcourse WHERE regularcourse.conum = operation_reg.conum AND regularcourse.codenum = operation_reg.codenum AND regularcourse.goutnum = operation_reg.regoperno GROUP BY operation_reg.regoperno ), operation_reg.regoperid) AS rcsepa
FROM
operation_reg
LEFT JOIN
regular
ON
operation_reg.conum = regular.conum
LEFT JOIN
regulardetail
ON
operation_reg.codenum = regulardetail.codenum
WHERE
operation_reg.regopercar = #{regopercar}
AND
operation_reg.regoperconfirm = #{regoperconfirm}
ORDER BY operation_reg.regoperday, regulardetail.rdnum, operation_reg.operregseq
